statements: SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM access_controls WHERE access_level >= 5;
SELECT id, role FROM access_controls ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role = 'Admin' AND access_level > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM access_controls;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, username FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE access_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 AND role='user' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM access_controls WHERE role='user';
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM access_controls WHERE access_level < 5 ORDER BY role;
SELECT * FROM access_controls;
SELECT role, user_id FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT data_category FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id = 10;
SELECT data_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_category = 'confidential';
SELECT user_id, role, access_level FROM access_controls ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT data_id, data_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_category = 'personal';
SELECT access_level, role FROM access_controls WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT data_info, data_category FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role, data_access_level FROM access_controls;
SELECT data_id, data_name FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id > 100;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT organization_id, data_privacy_policy FROM data_privacy;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, data_privacy_policy FROM data_privacy WHERE data_privacy_policy LIKE '%GDPR%';
SELECT user_id, role, data_access_level FROM access_controls ORDER BY data_access_level ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organization_id FROM data_privacy;
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT org_name, security_level FROM Organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT doc_name, security_level FROM DataDocuments WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT org_name, security_level FROM Organizations ORDER BY security_level DESC;
SELECT doc_name, doc_owner, security_level FROM DataDocuments WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT u.username, d.doc_name, a.access_time FROM Users u JOIN DataDocuments d ON u.user_id = d.doc_owner JOIN AccessLogs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;

SELECT o.org_name, u.username, d.doc_name, a.access_time FROM Organizations o JOIN Users u ON o.org_id = u.org_id JOIN DataDocuments d ON u.user_id = d.doc_owner JOIN AccessLogs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT access_level FROM access_controls ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM sensitive_data WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT organization_name FROM organizations WHERE organization_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '987e6543-dcba-21d3-ba56-426614173999');
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM sensitive_data WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT access_level, username FROM access_controls JOIN users ON access_controls.user_id = users.user_id WHERE data_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT organization_name, privacy_policy FROM organizations JOIN data_privacy ON organizations.organization_id = data_privacy.organization_id WHERE privacy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
